desc: Calling all style queens: knitted dresses are everywhere this season, and this one is no exception. A key-trend piece which is comfy, soft, and endlessly versatile, the temperatures don’t have to be in the minus’ to rock this style. With long sleeve styles to keep you warm in winter and halter neck options for summer, a knitted dress is not only a big hitter for winter. Pair a jumper dress with chunky boots or box-fresh trainers (depending on the season) and you’re good to go!

name: Tall Halterneck Rib Knit Longsleeve Bodysuit
attributes: 100% Acrylic. Machine wash. Model wears UK size UK10.
desc: Tall girls, we’ve got your back this season. This tall bodysuit is designed specifically for women 5’7” and over, perfect for longer torsos with a seamless, tucked-in finish, ideal for accentuating the figure. Say goodbye to clothes that compromise on comfort - our tall bodysuits are comfortable and practical, as well as versatile. Style these with ease, accessorising to your exact tastes and dress up or down to suit the occasion.

name: Red Plus Rib Knit Short Sleeve Bodysuit
attributes: 95% Polyester 5% Elastane. Machine Wash. Model wears UK size 16.
desc: Update your wardrobe with this plus size bodysuit from our dedicated curve range. A form fitting, curve enhancing style with a press-stud fastening, this piece can be dressed up or down, depending on the vibe. Team with coated jeans and statement heels for date night plans, or pair with tailored trousers for a brunch date with your bestie. For an instant fresh 'fit, a plus size black bodysuit is perfect to replace your go-to t shirts. Got a date night planned? Team a dreamy plus size lace bodysuit with a leather skirt and standout heels.

name: Rib Knitted Relaxed Wide Leg Set
attributes: 80% Livaeco viscose, 20% nylon. Machine wash. Model wears UK size M.
desc: Luxe vibes incoming. It's all about upping your loungewear game right now, girl, and we've got the knitted co-ord for you. From classic cable knit options to knitted tracksuits and printed sets, serve looks in an instant styled outfit to stop everyone scrolling. Braving the outdoors? Embrace the athleisure trend in a figure-hugging soft knitted set. Want the perfect matched outfit for spontaneous social hangs? Name a better duo than a cropped cardigan and rib knit-shorts…we'll wait.

desc: It's the season to feel snug and what better way than with this oversized jumper. Bigger than your usual size which elongates your silhouette, our women's oversized jumpers are cosy and comfortable for your autumn and winter wardrobe. Perfect for whatever plans you've got coming up, make a satin slip dress a little more casual with an oversized rib knit thrown on and banish those winter blues by stepping into a cable knit baggy jumper over leggings and ribbed socks. Warm and cosy is the vibe this season.

name: Tall Soft Rib Funnel Neck Short Sleeve Fitted Jumper
attributes: 80% Viscose, 20% Nylon. Machine Wash. Model wears UK size 10.
desc: What always passes the winter vibe check? If your answer was knitwear, you’ve scored 10/10. Our tall jumpers and cardigans are perfect for kitting out women 5’7” and over in comfortable knitted designs. Our tall knitwear has a longer cut at the arms and the torso, making them a much more practical, convenient choice, with a better fit for that comfy, cosy blend that we’re all shopping for this time of year. Ideal for winter, knitwear will keep you warm yet stylish.

name: Racer Neck Rib Knit Vest
attributes: 80% recycled viscose 20% polyester. Machine wash. Model wears UK size M
desc: Add textures, tones and details to your outfit this season with a knitted top. Soft, wrinkle-resistant, and seriously cosy, the ribbed top adds immediate dimension to your outfit whilst keeping you on-trend and comfortable, whether you're kicking back or on the go. Team a knitted bodysuit with a mini skirt and trainers or layer a crochet top over a dress for serious style points. From knitted vests to ribbed styles, we've got you covered whatever your vibe.

name: Basic Crew Neck Crop Jumper

We wear ours with high waisted denim, slick faux leather trousers and bold animal print skirts for a style that breaks the mould.

desc: Seeking a pullover jumper that brings super flattering vibes? Look no further than this cute cropped jumper. With the hem cut at or above the waist, this type of short jumper usually comes with long sleeves for maximum style impact and extra warmth. Helping to nip you in at the waist and create an hourglass silhouette, it's a look that will serve attitude over and over again. We wear ours with high waisted denim, slick faux leather trousers and bold animal print skirts for a style that breaks the mould.

desc: Warm, cosy, and perfect for transitional dressing, jumpers are a key piece for your casual wardrobe, and this style is no exception. A pullover garment that's perfect for layering, our latest drop of women's jumpers boasts on-trend details like fringe trims, statement sleeves and vibrant colours. Try knitted pieces with v-neck shapes and fluted sleeves, or keep things classic in a black jumper. Get on board with street style and try a long jumper styled with chunky trainers and an oversized coat.

attributes: 100% Cotton. Machine Wash Only. Model Wears UK Size 16.

Featuring long sleeves perfect for cold weather styling, this style is giving us all the cosy vibes. This season it’s all about going big, so grab an  oversized plus size jumper to take your winter streetwear to new heights – just team with chunky boots and a dreamy coat.

name: Roll Neck Jumper

desc: Roll out in a roll neck jumper this season and give that essential autumn uniform a cosy upgrade. name: Green Crew Neck Jumper
attributes: 100% Acrylic Model wears size M Machine wash at 30 degrees

With the hem cut at or above the waist, this type of short jumper usually comes with long sleeves for maximum style impact and extra warmth. We wear ours with high waisted denim, slick faux leather trousers and bold animal print skirts for a style that breaks the mould.

A pullover garment that's perfect for layering, our latest drop of women's jumpers boasts on-trend details like fringe trims, statement sleeves and vibrant colours. Try knitted pieces with v-neck shapes and fluted sleeves, or keep things classic in a black jumper. Get on board with street style and try a long jumper styled with chunky trainers and an oversized coat.

name: Fine Knit Roll Neck Knitted Midaxi Dress
attributes: 50% viscose, 28% polyester, 22% nylon. Machine wash. Model wears UK size M.
desc: Calling all style queens: knitted dresses are everywhere this season, and this one is no exception. A key-trend piece which is comfy, soft, and endlessly versatile, the temperatures don’t have to be in the minus’ to rock this style. With long sleeve styles to keep you warm in winter and halter neck options for summer, a knitted dress is not only a big hitter for winter. Pair a jumper dress with chunky boots or box-fresh trainers (depending on the season) and you’re good to go!
